pages.text: Found pretty much everywhere on the $(item)Lunar Plane$().$(br2)Makes for a very pretty building material, it's also used to build a few $(item)Multiblocks$().

pages.title: Shrines
pages.text: Various shrines are spread throughout the biomes of the $(item)Lunar Plane$().$(br2)These $(item)Shrines$() can contain resources that are useful to you.
